properties.activity: Colin's 3rd Annual Toy Drive for Anselma House
properties.location: Colin's House on Sims Estate Dr
properties.description: Colin has been doing this for years now, and we often hear from others that he has inspired them to help the Anselma House specifically, or another charity of their choice. At the Toy Drive we always have a chance to meet new faces, and visit with familiar ones.

Description: "Colin has been doing this for years now, and we often hear from others that he has inspired them to help the Anselma House specifically, or another charity of their choice. At the Toy Drive we always have a chance to meet new faces, and visit with familiar ones."

properties.activity: Holiday Potluck and Annual General Meeting
properties.description: Neighbours are starting to see this as an annual event to get together and connect with other residents. It also informs residents of some of the great work the VPNA has been up to and provides an opportunity for residents to provide feedback on suggested improvements, ideas, etc.
properties.popupContent:
Activity: Holiday Potluck and Annual General Meeting
Location: Victoria Park Pavilion
Neighbourhood: Victoria Park Neighbourhood
Date: 2014-11-23
Time: 6pm-9pm
Description: "Neighbours are starting to see this as an annual event to get together and connect with other residents. It also informs residents of some of the great work the VPNA has been up to and provides an opportunity for residents to provide feedback on suggested improvements, ideas, etc."

properties.description: This was an amazing event that brings our community together. We decorate a Christmas tree, we provide snacks. Children get to make crafts, decorate a gingerbread and have fun. Santa visited this year. Attendees also trace their hand, and all the hands is made into a Christmas tree that we put up the following year.
properties.popupContent:

Location: Bridgeport Community Centre
Neighbourhood: Bridgeport Neighbourhood
Date: 2014-11-30
Time: 4pm-6pm
Description: "This was an amazing event that brings our community together. We decorate a Christmas tree, we provide snacks. Children get to make crafts, decorate a gingerbread and have fun. Santa visited this year. Attendees also trace their hand, and all the hands is made into a Christmas tree that we put up the following year."
